word_mean: 营养〔法〕，饮食〔法〕：营养的给予或接受

sentence.Network_en: Most of us enjoy the abundance and variety in alimentation.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们这儿大部分人都知道食物的丰富和种类.

sentence.Network_en: The doctor has recommended changing my alimentation habits.
sentence.Network_cn: 医生建议改变我的营养习惯.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To research the influence of alimentation, active inducement for growth and development of child.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的研究营养 、 积极诱导等因素对小儿生长发育的影响.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in the sense 'maintenance, support'): from medieval Latin alimentatio (n-), from late Latin alimentare 'to feed', from alimentum 'nourishment' (see aliment)

means.word_mean: 1. a source of materials to nourish the body
2. the act of supplying food and nourishment
